alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Coffee and southwestern Jeff Davis Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rhine to near Fitzgerald. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Broxton, Ambrose, Pridgen and Snipesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
